lore: Warp Spiders attack without warning. They do this with their jump generators â€“ arcane dimensional devices that allow them to make short but dangerous leaps through the immaterium. When they return to reality, Warp Spiders fire clouds of razor-sharp monofilament wire at the foe, slicing them apart as they writhe in a doomed effort to escape.

otherAbilities.name: Flickerjump:
otherAbilities.description: In your Movement phase , when this unit makes a Normal move , it can make a flickerjump. If it does, until the end of the phase, its Move characteristic is changed to 24" but you must roll one D6 after this unit ends that move: on a 1, this unit suffers 1 mortal wound . This unit is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn in which it makes a flickerjump.

wargear.description: The Warp Spider Exarch can be equipped with 1 additional death spinner and 1 powerblades.
